title: Natural monopoly lower cost than many small firms

content.question: Which of the following must be true for a firm that is a natural monopoly?

choices.label: It can produce and supply its product to an entire market at a lower cost than could a number of smaller firms.
It produces at the minimum of its average total cost curve.
It has a patent on its product.
It will not be able to maximize profits unless subsidized by the government.
It is productively efficient for the government to break up the monopoly into smaller firms.

content.answer: It can produce and supply its product to an entire market at a lower cost than could a number of smaller firms.
